channel.title: Youtube sound issues
channel.description:
Hi,
When I watch video on youtube via Tor & Whonix there is a sound distortion, peoples voices sound like they're going slow so they're deeper and a bit annoying.
This is consistent, I have restarted several times, used different broadband connections.
Any suggestions?
Thanks,

item.title: Youtube sound issues
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
You mean stuttering? That’s because of low connection.

Using Qubes-Whonix? Then it’s not a Whonix issue. Would happen in other VMs also, no? In that case use Qubes sound low latency.

Read full topic
